1121117853296447488.text: What is the future of blockchain? @UnderscoreVC surveyed hundreds of blockchain leaders to find out: http://futureofblockchain.org

1123209023992487936.text:
It's rare that you can solve someone else's problem. But it's common that you can help by reframing the problem.

When you hold up a mirror so people can see their problems with greater perspective and clarity, they can often find their own solutions.

#TuesdayThoughts
